statements: DELETE FROM patients WHERE age > 50 AND diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
DELETE FROM MedicalRecords WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND date <= '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM telemedicine_appointments WHERE doctor_id = 500 AND appointment_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM telemedicine_appointments WHERE doctor_id = 3 AND appointment_id = 5;
DELETE FROM telemedicine_doctors WHERE doctor_name='Dr. Smith';
DELETE FROM telemedicine_doctors WHERE practice_address = '123 Main St';
